notes.text:
This update for dpkg fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-1664: Fixed a directory traversal vulnerability in Dpkg::Source::Archive (bsc#1199944).

notes.text: Dpkg::Source::Archive in dpkg, the Debian package management system, before version 1.21.8, 1.20.10, 1.19.8, 1.18.26 is prone to a directory traversal vulnerability. When extracting untrusted source packages in v2 and v3 source package formats that include a debian.tar, the in-place extraction can lead to directory traversal situations on specially crafted orig.tar and debian.tar tarballs.
